mapper.select: select a.cno, a.content, a.writer, a.regdate, a.visit, b.profile from comment a left outer join bcc_member b on a.writer = b.id where a.num = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(num, content, writer, visit) value(#{num}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{visit})
mapper.update: update comment set content = #{content} where cno = #{cno}
mapper.select: select num, cno, content, writer, regdate from comment where cno = #{cno}
mapper.update: update tourist_spot b set b.commentCnt = (select count(cno) from comment where num = #{num}) where b.num = #{num}
